title: Promethean World shares slip as loss widens
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 13, 2015, 10:35 BST - UK Markets close in 5 hrs 55 mins Promethean World shares slip as loss widens By Victoria Young | Sharecast – 1 minute 54 seconds ago 20.65 +0.20 
  Education equipment company Promethean World (Other OTC: PMTWF - news ) posted a bigger first half loss, off weaker revenues. Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) in the company, which makes interactive screens for classrooms, were down by 0.32% to 38.75p at 1537 BST. In July the company agreed to be taken over by Chinese software company NetDragon Websoft (HKSE: 0777.HK - news ) , in a deal worth £84.1 m. 
Promethean World posted a 65% bigger loss in the first six months of this year to £7,114m from £4.311m. 
Revenue was down to £52.8m from £57.7m, while the company posted a basic loss per share of 3.49p from 2.15p.
